name: Root Man and The Root of All Evil
name_original: Root Man and The Root of All Evil
description:
Root man battles against the root of all evil and his mighty root vegetable army, in this "reverse roguelike" you lose powers as you win making each battle deadlier to than the last.  

A Game made for the 2023 global game jam, in Melbourne

Created by Nick, Chris, David, Simon, Andrew, Matt, Logan

and special thanks to afro Nick, get well soon
